title: Official Trailer for Possession Horror 'Shaman' Set in Rural Ecuador
description: "It inhabits him now." "Our boy is sick, that is all." Well Go USA has revealed an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Shaman, set in rural Ecuador. Made by filmmaker Antonio Negret, Shaman will debut to watch including on VOD starting in August this summer. Shot on location in Ecuador. A Missionary trying to convert an Indigenous Community on this remote Ecuadorian volcano must come to terms with her Faith when her son is possessed by dark forces. Candice believes that an exorcism in the Catholic tradition will free her boy from the evil bonds that bind him. The local shamans know that this spirit is older than her religion and must be dealt with or the demon will take them all. Starring Sara Canning, Daniel Gillies, Jett Klyne, Alejandro Fajardo, & Segundo Fuérez. It looks like it has some seriously creepy moments and actually unsettling jump scares. It's definitely not for the faint of heart! Stay away from ancient demons. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Antonio Negret's horror film Shaman, direct from YouTube: A missionary family travels to rural Ecuador to convert the indigenous population. All is going well until their son ventures into […]

text: TRAILERS by June 27, 2025Source: YouTube "It inhabits him now." "Our boy is sick, that is all." Well Go USA has revealed an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Shaman, set in rural Ecuador. Made by filmmaker Antonio Negret, Shaman will debut to watch including on VOD starting in August this summer. Shot on location in Ecuador. A Missionary trying to convert an Indigenous Community on this remote Ecuadorian volcano must come to terms with her Faith when her son is possessed by dark forces. Candice believes that an exorcism in the Catholic tradition will free her boy from the evil bonds that bind him. The local shamans know that this spirit is older than her religion and must be dealt with or the demon will take them all. Starring Sara Canning, Daniel Gillies, Jett Klyne, Alejandro Fajardo, & Segundo Fuérez. It looks like it has some seriously creepy moments and actually unsettling jump scares. It's definitely not for the faint of heart! Stay away from ancient demons. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Antonio Negret's horror film Shaman, direct from YouTube: A missionary family travels to rural Ecuador to convert the indigenous population. All is going well until their son ventures into a forbidden local cave and comes out with a demonic spirit in tow. Candice (Sarah Canning) believes that an exorcism in the Catholic tradition will free her boy from the evil bonds that bind him. The local shamans know that this spirit is older than her religion and must be dealt with or it will take them all. Shaman is directed by international genre filmmaker Antonio Negret, director of the films Towards Darkness, Seconds Apart, Transit, and Overdrive previously, plus tons of work directing TV series recently. The screenplay is written by Daniel Negret. Produced by Christian Rojas E., Antonio Negret, Daniel Negret, and Luiza Ricupero. This hasn't premiered at any festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Well Go USA releases Negret's Shaman in select US theaters + on VOD starting on August 8th, 2025 coming soon. Find more posts in: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
June 27, 2025
Source: YouTube

"It inhabits him now." "Our boy is sick, that is all." Well Go USA has revealed an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Shaman, set in rural Ecuador. Made by filmmaker Antonio Negret, Shaman will debut to watch including on VOD starting in August this summer. Shot on location in Ecuador. A Missionary trying to convert an Indigenous Community on this remote Ecuadorian volcano must come to terms with her Faith when her son is possessed by dark forces. Candice believes that an exorcism in the Catholic tradition will free her boy from the evil bonds that bind him. The local shamans know that this spirit is older than her religion and must be dealt with or the demon will take them all. Starring Sara Canning, Daniel Gillies, Jett Klyne, Alejandro Fajardo, & Segundo Fuérez. It looks like it has some seriously creepy moments and actually unsettling jump scares. It's definitely not for the faint of heart! Stay away from ancient demons.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Antonio Negret's horror film Shaman, direct from YouTube:

A missionary family travels to rural Ecuador to convert the indigenous population. All is going well until their son ventures into a forbidden local cave and comes out with a demonic spirit in tow. Candice (Sarah Canning) believes that an exorcism in the Catholic tradition will free her boy from the evil bonds that bind him. The local shamans know that this spirit is older than her religion and must be dealt with or it will take them all. Shaman is directed by international genre filmmaker Antonio Negret, director of the films Towards Darkness, Seconds Apart, Transit, and Overdrive previously, plus tons of work directing TV series recently. The screenplay is written by Daniel Negret. Produced by Christian Rojas E., Antonio Negret, Daniel Negret, and Luiza Ricupero. This hasn't premiered at any festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Well Go USA releases Negret's Shaman in select US theaters + on VOD starting on August 8th, 2025 coming soon.

Find more posts in: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer
